table_caption: Anatomic areas of the twenty most informative voxels derived from the averaged SVM sensitivity maps for WMD.
table_foot: These points were restricted to be at least 10.5 mm distant from each other. The coordinates given are in MNI space. For easier interpretation, we first applied the natural logarithm to the sensitivity values and then rescaled them to be between zero and one.Abbreviations: WM, white matter; L, left hemisphere; R, right hemisphere.
